levels.title: Slice the fruits
messages: Fruits are among the foods it is recommended you consume on a daily basis. In general, 2-3 fruits per day is your ultimate goal. Selecting a fruit as a snack, at school or in the afternoon, will help you achieve your daily goal. To do so, give fruit a priority: first eat the fruit, then anything else!

levels.title: Slice the vegetables
messages: Go with a salad at your meals!

Vegetables, like fruits, are also recommended to be consumed on a daily basis. They can be served as a salad or even as a main dish. To meet your everyday goal, accompany your main meals with veggies!

levels.title: Slice the fruits and vegetables with red color
messages: Discover the F&V palette of colours!

Fruits and vegetables are the most colorful food groups. Their colours, however, are not only a pleasure for your eyes, but for your body, as well. Behind a colour, certain substances exist, which specifically benefit a system of your body. In other words, the different colours are good for different systems of the body. Discover them!
